name: Lucifer's Temple
description: One of your marine buddies was kidnapped from a sect of devil-worshippers and murdered (yep, that's him in the rock-pit) and it's up to you to get some revenge... it's a lame, generic plot line but who gives a shit? i'm not sure anybody would worship "satan" in the first place... it's make-believe dammit! worship the sun! worship nature! fuck organized religion!</rant> sorry about that.
